issue.title: [R] Additional Lubridate Capabilities
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16841](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16841). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Umbrella Ticket for the remaining lubridate work.

This is functionality that we have scoped, but we have decided to wait to implement until it is requested by someone proactively.
